Because the weather is set to deteriorate and because of my commute and the time of my show, I’ve been advised to stay home tomorrow and Friday. I never take unscheduled time off, ever! But I’m taking the advice and staying off the roads. Stay safe everyone! See you all on Monday
@cahillers I got tired, that took ages 😂
Do you wanna build a snowmaaaaaan ☃️ https://t.co/22lztnVHEo
@corrinteis Cosy! Exactly what I knit them for ☺️ As a side note; it’s written RIGHT THERE, get the spelling right 😂
I’m not really sure what to do now. Build a snowman while listening to @IanDempsey ? ☃️☃️☃️ #BeastFromTheEast @TodayFM
.@IanDempsey SAVES THE DAY! Thank you Iano! He’s on @TodayFM right now because he made it in through #beastfromtheeast - tune in and he’ll keep you going! 🙌🏽
@MauraONeill1 It’s so pretty isn’t it? Pretty and terrifying 😂 Stay safe yourself, mind the footpaths - every surface is just so slippy 😩 Xxx
@HelenVaughan24 Thanks Helen! I assume you’re up feeding your little lady 😍 Hope alls well xxx
@DamoGrimes Oh god please be careful. I was terrified out there earlier. (And yes, I shouldn’t have laughed at all the sensible people buying their snow bread 😂)
@shanebreslin @suzi_o_neill Exact same as me - and I too am googling how to make bread 😂 Openly mocking those who prepare adequately for a snow-storm live on-air wasn’t one of my finer decisions 😂
@BallyfermotDave I’m very north Dublin and it took me 15 minutes to get 2 miles up the road... before I saw sense. Mad conditions! It might be ok in a few hours but not right now.
@suzi_o_neill And there I was mocking all the people stockpiling over the last few days 😂
@brilloquinn Nutter 😂
@ArcticChimpanze ah thanks a mil. Got quite the fright I have to say, never experienced anything like that before. It’s beautiful to see though! Being out in it is a different story 😳☃️
@suzi_o_neill I’m up the road from you and tried to drive... not a hope of getting to work. It’s so scary. Beautiful from inside looking out though!

If you’re a fan of Sopranos, you’ll love #Gomorrah. I started last week and I’m on episode 11 already... I’m blaming the cold weather! It is brilliant!
It’s subtitled so for the first time in ages I’ve put my phone away while watching TV. I actually know what’s going on! 🙌🏽

Lady Bird was good but predictable! And the stereotypes were painful - the mean rich pretty girl, the chubby loyal best friend... I'll stop there for those who haven't seen it. Good, not brilliant. (Saoirse was great though!)
